snippet.title: GAME & WATCH DONKEY KONG II (Nintendo - Handheld - 1983)
snippet.description:
Game & Watch Donkey Kong is a platform game released by Nintendo in 1982, as a handheld.

Donkey Kong captured a beautiful girl and carries her into a building under construction. The brave carpenter Mario comes to rescue her following them over the girders. Donkey Kong will throw barrels at Mario to stop him an any cost.

Game is played on two screens. The barrels which Donkey Kong throws on upper screen roll down to lower screen. When Mario reaches top of lower screen, he emerges on upper screen.

#GameAndWatch #Nintendo #Handheld #Longplay #Gameplay #RetroDanuart #RetroGaming #YoutubeGaming

-Video Summary:
0:00 - Intro
0:03 - Loop 1
0:24 - Loop 2
0:47 - Loop 3
1:13 - Loop 4
